page.title: 01ELMSWELL
page.content:
There are about 2450 people living in Elmswell. The village is about half a mile from the A45. The A.45 is a major road which runs across East Anglia from East to West. Many people use Elmswell as a dormitory town and come along the A45 to towns such as Bury St. Edmunds, Ipswich or even to the large dock complex at Felixstowe. There is also a regular rail service which runs from the village railway station. This makes it easy for people to travel to Ipswich, Cambridge or Norwich.
Our survey was carried out in school and shows how many people work in Elmswell, and how many people commute.
